subject: Computer Science
title: IEEE 754 - Floating Point Arithmetic
description: Prior to the IEEE 754 standard, there was no standard for floating point arithmetic. This led to inconsistencies in floating point calculations across different platforms. Portability was a nightmare. The IEEE 754 standard was created to address this issue by providing a standard format for representing floating point numbers and performing arithmetic operations on them.
objectives: Understand the IEEE 754 standard for floating point arithmetic
Learn how to represent floating point numbers in IEEE 754 format
Understand the different components of a floating point number
Learn how to perform arithmetic operations on floating point numbers
Understand the difference between single precision and double precision floating point numbers
